exerelin_abilities.followMeTooltip1: Nearby non-busy fleets belonging to your faction or an alliance member will follow you around for $numDays days.
exerelin_abilities.followMeTooltip2: Only works on patrol, strike and defense fleets, and the fleet must have seen you with your transponder on.

exerelin_alliances.intelDesc: The $alliance alliance is present in the Sector. It has $numMembers members, with $numMarkets markets of total size $marketSizeSum.
exerelin_alliances.intelDissolvedDesc: The $alliance alliance has been dissolved. Its members have gone their separate ways.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescPeaceYes: The alliance $alliance has voted to make peace with $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescPeaceNo: The alliance $alliance has voted against making peace with $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescWarYes: The alliance $alliance has voted to declare war on $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.intelDescWarNo: The alliance $alliance has voted against declaring war on $theOtherParty.
exerelin_alliances.defiesDecisionWar: $defying defies the decision and refuses to declare war!
exerelin_alliances.defiesDecisionPeace: $defying defies the decision and continues the war!
exerelin_alliances.defyDecisionWar: $defying defy the decision and refuses to declare war!
exerelin_alliances.defyDecisionPeace: $defying defy the decision and continue the war!
exerelin_alliances.numAlliances: There are $numAlliances alliance(s) in the Sector

nex_agents.intelDescLost: Agent $name has been captured or killed.
nex_agents.intelDescDismissed: Agent $name has been dismissed from your service.
nex_agents.intelDescLocation: $name is currently $onOrAt $market, a $faction market in the $location.
nex_agents.intelDescLocationHyper: $name is currently $onOrAt $market, a $faction market in hyperspace.
nex_agents.intelDescLocalReport1: %s is a size %s market, of stability %s.
nex_agents.intelDescLocalReport2: Space patrol strength: %s, ground defence strength: %s
nex_agents.intelPromptAbort: Aborting the mission now will refund %s credits. Proceed?
nex_agents.barPrompt: A shady-looking $manOrWoman is sitting in a corner of the bar. $HeOrShe gives you an appraising look.
nex_agents.barOptionStart: Walk over to the shady person
nex_agents.barDialogIntro1: You approach the shady figure, who acknowledges you with a nod.
nex_agents.barDialogIntro2: "Figured you'd notice me eventually. I don't suppose you know what I do?"
nex_agents.barDialogExplanation: "I'm a $manOrWoman of many tricks, shall we say. I can sniff out a Pather in a crowd at forty paces, or assassinate the governor of a colony, or even take down a core world's spaceport if the odds are right. I think an enterprising starfarer like you will have no problem finding a use for such... talents."
nex_agents.barDialogPay: "I'll expect a %s credit hiring bonus, and afterwards a starting salary of %s credits per month. Once the initial transfer is complete, I'll be ready for directions within the hour."
"I'll expect a %s credit hiring bonus. Once the initial transfer is complete, I'll be ready for directions within the hour."
nex_agents.barOptionMaxAgents: "I can't hire any more agents at the moment."
nex_agents.barOptionNotEnoughCredits: "I can't afford that at the moment."
nex_agents.barDialogHired: "Excellent." $HeOrShe slides a data chip across the table before getting up and leaving. "I'll be in touch."
nex_agents.barDialogHiredTip: You can find your newly hired agent in the Intel screen, using the Agents tag.
nex_agents.tooltipSalary: Each agent receives a base salary of %s credits per month, plus %s credits per agent level.

nex_agentActions.intelDesc_raiseRelations_success: An agent from $theAgentFaction has subverted the $faction political process to improve relations with their own faction.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_raiseRelations_successPlayer: Your agent $agentName has successfully subverted the $faction political process to improve relations with $theThirdFaction.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_raiseRelations_failure: An agent from $theAgentFaction failed to subvert the $faction political process to improve relations with their own faction. Fortunately, their attempts at manipulation went unnoticed.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_raiseRelations_failurePlayer: Your agent $agentName failed to subvert the $faction political process to improve relations with $theThirdFaction. Fortunately, their attempts at manipulation went undetected.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_raiseRelations_failureDetected: An agent from $theAgentFaction was discovered attempting to manipulate the $faction political process to improve relations with their own faction. Instead, their meddling has caused the opposite effect.
Your agent $agentName was discovered attempting to manipulate the $faction political process to improve relations with $theThirdFaction. They are not amused.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_lowerRelations_success: An agent from $theAgentFaction has subverted the $faction political process to turn it against $theThirdFaction.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_lowerRelations_successPlayer: Your agent $agentName has subverted the $faction political process to turn it against $theThirdFaction.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_lowerRelations_failure: An agent from $theAgentFaction failed to subvert the $faction political process to turn it against $theThirdFaction. Fortunately, their attempts at manipulation went unnoticed.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_lowerRelations_failurePlayer: Your agent $agentName failed to subvert the $faction political process to turn it against $theThirdFaction. Fortunately, their attempts at manipulation went unnoticed.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_lowerRelations_failureDetected: An agent from $theAgentFaction was discovered attempting to manipulate the $faction political process to turn it against $theThirdFaction. Ironically, their actions have turned the two would-be enemies against their own faction instead.

Your agent $agentName was discovered attempting to manipulate the $faction political process to turn it against $theThirdFaction. $TheAgentFaction will not thank you for turning both factions against them.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destabilizeMarket_success: An agent from $theAgentFaction has $actionLine $onOrAt $market. $Faction investigators are appealing to the public to come forward with information on the attack.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destabilizeMarket_successPlaye: Your agent $agentName has $actionLine $onOrAt $market. $Faction investigators are appealing to the public to come forward with information on the attack.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destabilizeMarket_successDetec: An agent from $theAgentFaction has $actionLine $onOrAt $market. $Faction authorities have found evidence of $agentFaction involvement.
Your agent $agentName has $actionLine $onOrAt $market. $Faction authorities have found evidence of $agentFaction involvement.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destabilizeMarket_failure: An attempt by a $agentFaction agent to cause chaos $onOrAt $market has been thwarted. $Faction authorities have been unable to identify the party responsible, however.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destabilizeMarket_failurePlaye: $Faction security has thwarted your agent $agentName's attempts to cause chaos $onOrAt $market. Fortunately, they have been unable to conclusively link you to the crime.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destabilizeMarket_failureDetec: An $agentFaction operative was captured while attempting to destabilize $market. $Faction intelligence is reported to be planning reprisals.
Your agent $agentName was discovered while attempting to destabilize $market. $Faction intelligence is reported to be planning reprisals.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_sabotageIndustry_success: An agent from $theAgentFaction has sabotaged the $industry $onOrAt $market. $Faction investigators have no leads on the crime.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_sabotageIndustry_successPlayer: Your agent $agentName has sabotaged the $industry $onOrAt $market, and made it look like an accident.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_sabotageIndustry_successDetect: An agent from $theAgentFaction has sabotaged the $industry $onOrAt $market. $Faction authorities have found evidence of $agentFaction involvement.
Your agent $agentName has sabotaged the $industry $onOrAt $market. $Faction intelligence has traced the attack back to $theAgentFaction.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_sabotageIndustry_failure: An attempt by a $agentFaction agent to sabotage the $industry $onOrAt $market has been thwarted. $Faction authorities have been unable to identify the party responsible, however.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_sabotageIndustry_failurePlayer: $Faction security has thwarted your agent $agentName's attempt to sabotage the $industry $onOrAt $market. Fortunately, $theFaction has not been able to determine who was responsible.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_sabotageIndustry_failureDetect: An agent sent by the $agentFaction to sabotage the $industry $onOrAt $market was seized by authorities. $TheFaction is regarding this as a hostile act.
Your agent $agentName has been caught attempting to sabotage the $industry $onOrAt $market. $TheFaction is expected to respond forcefully.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destroyCommodities_success: A $agentFaction agent has destroyed a stockpile of $commodity $onOrAt $market. $Faction investigators are finding themselves stumped.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destroyCommodities_successPlay: Your agent $agentName has destroyed a stockpile of $commodity $onOrAt $market. $Faction authorities have their suspicions, but are unable to find any real evidence of $agentFaction involvement.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destroyCommodities_successDete: A $agentFaction agent has destroyed a stockpile of $commodity $onOrAt $market. $Faction authorities accuse $theAgentFaction of the crime.
Your agent $agentName has destroyed a stockpile of $commodity $onOrAt $market. $Faction authorities have identified $theAgentFaction as responsible for the attack.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destroyCommodities_failure: Attempts by an agent of $agentFaction to destroy $commodity stocked $onOrAt $market have failed. $Faction authorities have been unable to determine who was responsible, however.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destroyCommodities_failurePlay: Your agent $agentName has failed in their attempt to $commodity stocked $onOrAt $market. Fortunately, $theFaction has not traced the crime back to $agentFaction.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_destroyCommodities_failureDete: An agent of $theAgentFaction was arrested by $faction authorities while attempting to destroy stocks of $commodity $onOrAt $market.
$TheFaction counterintelligence has stopped your $agentName in an attempt to destroy $commodity stockpiled $onOrAt $market.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_infiltrateCell_success: $AgentFaction intelligence has broken up a $faction cell on $market, a success cheered by the population.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_infiltrateCell_successPlayer: Your agent $agentName has infiltrated and broken up a $faction cell on $market. They won't be a problem any longer, at least for a while.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_infiltrateCell_failure: An $agentFaction agent has failed to penetrate a $faction cell on $market. Terrorist activity continues.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_infiltrateCell_failurePlayer: Your agent $agentName has failed to infiltrate a $faction cell on $market. They're fortunate to be alive — such cells have a short way with traitors.
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_lowerRelations_success: "$TheFaction and $theThirdFaction now have some unresolved disputes. Wonder why..."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_lowerRelations_failure: "We failed to drive a wedge between $theFaction and $theThirdFaction."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_destabilizeMarket_fail: "We failed to cause panic on $market. Apologies."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_sabotageIndustry_succe: "The $industry on $market is now so much scrap for months."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_sabotageIndustry_failu: "I have failed to disrupt the $industry on $market. I am sorry."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_destroyCommodities_suc: "Hopefully $theFaction didn't need all those $commodity on $market anyway. Ha."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_destroyCommodities_fai: "We were unable to destroy the $commodity stockpiles on $market."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_infiltrateCell_success: "The $faction cell on $market is no more. Death take them all."
nex_agentActions.intel_lastMessage_injury_success: "Recovered from injuries. Ready for duty once more."
nex_agentActions.destabilizeText2: fired into a crowd at a public venue
nex_agentActions.destabilizeText6: released nerve gas into a recreational area
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_agentLost: Agent $agentName has been captured or killed.
nex_agentActions.intelDesc_gainedXPAndLeveledUp: $agentName gained %s XP and has reached level %s.
nex_agentActions.cellBaseLocation: The cell was supported from $baseName, a base in the $location.
nex_agentActions.dialogTooltipAlreadyModifyingRelations: Another agent is currently already manipulating this faction.
nex_agentActions.dialogTooltipModifyingRelationsCooldown: This faction has already been recently manipulated. It will take $cooldown before further such actions can be executed.
nex_agentActions.dialogInfoModifyingRelationsCooldown: This faction has already been manipulated in the recent past. Further such actions will take longer.

nex_avertDialog.optionBribe: Allocate sufficient funds for bribes and other means of disrupting the planning
nex_avertDialog.optionConnections: Use your connections to disrupt the planning
nex_avertDialog.descStart: $TheExpeditionName is still in the planning stages, and you have several options at your disposal to ensure it never gets off the ground.
nex_avertDialog.descBribe: Sufficient funding allocated to proper official and unofficial actors should ensure that $theExpeditionName does not go beyond the planning stage.
nex_avertDialog.descBribe2: A total of %s should be enough to get the job done, and will also ensure that your standing with $theFaction does not suffer.
nex_avertDialog.descConnections: You can use your connections to pull a few strings and ensure $theExpeditionName never gets beyond the planning stage.
nex_avertDialog.descConnections2: Calling in these favors will reduce your standing with $theFaction by %s points.
nex_avertDialog.descConnectionsTooLow: You do not have sufficient connections with $faction officials to stall out this kind of an operation.

nex_baseStrike.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre attacking and destroying $market, a $targetFaction base in the $location. The strike forces are projected to be $strDesc and are likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
nex_baseStrike.intelDescUnknown: $TheFaction $isOrAre attacking and destroying a $targetFaction base in the $location. The strike forces are projected to be $strDesc and are likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
nex_baseStrike.intelStageAction: The strike force is currently in-system.
nex_baseStrike.intelStageActionSuccess: The strike force has succesfully destroyed $market.
nex_baseStrike.intelStageActionDefeated: The strike force has been defeated by the defenders of of $market.
nex_baseStrike.intelStageActionAborted: The strike mission has been aborted.

nex_bombardment.satBombDesc: A saturation bombardment will destabilize the colony, reduce its population, and disrupt all operations for a long time.
nex_bombardment.satBombDescDestroy: A saturation bombardment of a colony this size will destroy it utterly.
nex_bombardment.satBombWarning: An atrocity of this scale cannot be hidden, and will make the following factions hostile:
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningSmall: An atrocity of this scale cannot be hidden. $market is sufficiently low-populated and/or remote that the reputational impacts will be limited, but the following factions will nevertheless be angry:
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningAllHostile: An atrocity of this scale cannot be hidden, but any factions that would be dismayed by such actions are already hostile to you.
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningVengeful: Due to their hatred of $theFaction, the following factions can be expected to overlook your crime:
nex_bombardment.satBombWarningHidden: As $market is a hidden and/or transient habitation, its destruction will not attract much, if any, attention from other factions.

nex_bounties.factionBountyIntel_desc1: %s authorities have posted a bounty on all hostile fleets across the Sector.
nex_bounties.factionBountyIntel_desc3: Payment depends on the number and size of ships destroyed. Standing with $theFaction may also improve.
nex_bounties.factionBountyIntel_desc4NoHostile: $TheFaction $isOrAre not currently hostile to any major factions.
nex_bounties.factionBountyIntel_descEnded: This bounty is no longer on offer.

nex_colonyFleet.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre sending an expedition to colonize $market, $aOrAn $planetType in the $location. The flotilla is projected to be $strDesc and is likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
nex_colonyFleet.intelStageAction: The colony expedition is currently in-system.
nex_colonyFleet.intelOutcomeSuccessWithRename: The expedition has colonized $oldName, which they have renamed to $market.
nex_colonyFleet.intelOutcomeQueueJumpedEarly: $market has already been colonized by $theOtherFaction. The expedition has been cancelled and its organizers have sent the queue-jumpers a note of protest.
nex_colonyFleet.intelOutcomeQueueJumped: $market has already been colonized by $theOtherFaction. The would-be settlers are returning to their homes in great sorrow.
nex_colonyFleet.intelOutcomeQueueFriendly: $market has already been colonized by $theOtherFaction. The settlers have been absorbed into the new polity.
nex_colonyFleet.intelOutcomeInvadeFailed: $market has already been colonized by $theOtherFaction. The $faction settlers' attempt to seize their "rightful" land has been repulsed with great loss of life.
nex_colonyFleet.intelOutcomeInvadeSuccess: $market had already been colonized by $theOtherFaction. The $faction settlers have taken over by force.

nex_conquestMission.intelDesc1: $TheFaction desires that another faction conquer $market in the $location, currently held by $theOtherFaction, and transfer it to their control.
nex_conquestMission.intelDesc1Alt: $TheFaction desires that another faction conquer $market in the $location, previously held by $theOtherFaction, and transfer it to their control.
nex_conquestMission.intelDesc2: Successful completion will result in a size-based reputation gain (in addition to that from a normal transfer). The credit reward is equal to the shutdown value of the structures and industries $onOrAt $market, plus a bonus based on its size and stability.
nex_conquestMission.intelDesc3: After taking control of $market, talk to local officials to perform the transfer.
nex_conquestMission.intelDescOutcome_alreadyTaken: $TheFaction has conquered $market using their own resources. The mission is over.
nex_conquestMission.intelDescOutcome_noLongerHostile: $market's current faction is not currently hostile. The mission has been withdrawn.
nex_conquestMission.intelDescOutcome_noLongerExists: The mission has been withdrawn as $market has been destroyed.

nex_credits.contribution_darkRevenant: Much coding help; compatibility with SS+ and descendant mods
nex_credits.contribution_lazyWizard: Version Checker, Console Commands, other code
nex_credits.contribution_fractalSoftworks: The Fractal Softworks team that made Starsector

nex_decivEvent.freeSpace: Your fleet's holds can accommodate an additional %s units of cargo.
nex_decivEvent.freeSpaceFuel: Your fleet's fuel tanks can hold an additional %s units of fuel.
nex_decivEvent.freeSpaceCrew: Your fleet's crew quarters can accommodate an additional %s personnel.

nex_defenseFleet.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre dispatching a task force to defend $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction. The defense forces are projected to be $strDesc and are likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
nex_defenseFleet.intelStageAction: The defense forces are currently in-system.
nex_defenseFleet.intelOutcomeSuccess: The defense forces have completed their mission.

nex_disruptMission.intelDesc1: $TheFaction desires that a third party disrupt the $industry $onOrAt $market, a size $size market held by $theOtherFaction in the $location.
nex_disruptMission.intelDescReason: The primary reason for the bounty is
nex_disruptMission.intelDescReasonEconomic: the competition posed to $theFaction in the market for $commodity.
nex_disruptMission.intelDescReasonFreePort: $market's "free port" status, and the concomitant export of illegal goods alongside it being a haven for various undesirables.
nex_disruptMission.intelDesc3: The $industry must be disrupted for at least $disruptionTime days to complete the mission.
nex_disruptMission.intelDescOutcome_industryRemoved: The target industry no longer exists $onOrAt $market.
nex_disruptMission.intelDescOutcome_noLongerHostile: $market's current faction is not currently hostile. The mission has been withdrawn.
nex_disruptMission.intelDescOutcome_noLongerExists: The mission has been withdrawn as $market has been destroyed.
nex_disruptMission.intelDescOutcome_alreadyDisrupted: The industry has already been disrupted.

exerelin_diplomacy.intelRepResultPositive: Relations between $faction1 and $faction2 improved by $deltaAbs, to $newRelationStr.
exerelin_diplomacy.intelRepResultNegative: Relations between $faction1 and $faction2 reduced by $deltaAbs, to $newRelationStr.
exerelin_diplomacy.player_peace_msg: You are no longer hostile to $factionOrAlliance
exerelin_diplomacy.intelCeasefireDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre offering a $ceasefireOrPeaceTreaty to end the ongoing hostilities. In the absence of further overt hostile actions, this will run for at least $days days and until further diplomatic events occur.
exerelin_diplomacy.intelCeasefireDescTime: You have $timeLeft $days to accept or reject the offer.

nex_diplomacyProfile.title: Diplomacy Profile
nex_diplomacyProfile.claimedMarkets: $TheFaction has revanchist claims on the following markets:
nex_diplomacyProfile.claimedMarketsNone: $TheFaction does not have revanchist claims on any markets.
nex_diplomacyProfile.dispositionGood: $TheFaction $isOrAre favourably inclined towards us and will try to cultivate a positive relationship with us.
nex_diplomacyProfile.dispositionNeutral: $TheFaction $isOrAre uncertain where they stand with regard to us, and may take positive or negative actions.
nex_diplomacyProfile.dispositionBad: $TheFaction $isOrAre unfriendly towards us and will look to pick a fight.
nex_diplomacyProfile.dispositionWarRisk: At current relations and disposition, $theFaction may declare war on us if the opportunity arises.
nex_diplomacyProfile.wearinessTooHighForWar: $TheFaction has too much war weariness to deliberately seek out any new wars at present.
nex_diplomacyProfile.wearinessEnoughForPeace: $TheFaction may be amenable to negotiating peace with another faction.

exerelin_factions.intel_descEliminated: $TheFaction $hasOrHave lost their last stronghold of $market, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Sector are clearly over.
exerelin_factions.intel_descSpawned: $TheFaction $isOrAre moving into the Sector, with a foothold in $market.
exerelin_factions.intel_descRespawned: $TheFaction $hasOrHave regained a foothold in the Sector, at $market.
exerelin_factions.intel_descWon: With the defeat of $theFaction, your $playerFaction reigns supreme over the Sector. Congratulations!
exerelin_factions.intel_descLost: With your faction beaten and scattered, you are on your own with whatever allies you still have or can cobble up. It may be time to find greener pastures elsewhere.

nex_fleetIntel.title: $Action: $market
nex_fleetIntel.desc: $TheFaction $isOrAre $actioning $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction. The $forceType $isOrAre projected to be $strDesc and $isOrAre likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
nex_fleetIntel.strCompare: Compared to the defenses, $theAction's space forces are %s and its ground forces are %s.
nex_fleetIntel.predictionDefeatInOrbit: $TheAction is likely to be defeated in orbit.
nex_fleetIntel.predictionDefeatOnGround: $TheAction is likely to be largely repelled by the ground defences.
nex_fleetIntel.predictionBombard: $theForceType is likely to resort to tactical bombardment.
nex_fleetIntel.outcomeNoLongerHostile: As $target's current faction is not currently hostile, $theAction has been cancelled.
nex_fleetIntel.outcomeNoLongerExists: $target has been destroyed by another hostile party.
nex_fleetIntel.stageOrganizeUnknown: $TheAction is currently in the planning stages.
nex_fleetIntel.stageOrganizeDisrupted: $TheAction has been disrupted in the planning stages and will not happen.
nex_fleetIntel.stageAssembleUnknown: $TheForceType $isOrAre currently assembling at an unknown location.
nex_fleetIntel.stageAssembleFail: $TheForceType $hasOrHave failed to successfully assemble at the rendezvous point.
nex_fleetIntel.stageActionDefeatedGround: $TheForceType $hasOrHave been repelled by the ground defenses of $market.
nex_fleetIntel.stageActionDefeatedSpace: $TheForceType $hasOrHave been defeated by the defenders of of $market.

nex_fleetRequest.fleetCostHelp: The fleet(s) will cost $credits credits per FP.
nex_fleetRequest.fleetCostHelpMarines: For invasion fleets, adding marines will multiply the cost, up to $marineMult times the base cost.
nex_fleetRequest.fleetSpawnMessage: The task force is being prepared for launch.
nex_fleetRequest.tooltipInsufficientFunds: Dispatching this task force requires $cost credits. You only have $credits credits.
nex_fleetRequest.proceedConfirmNonHostile: $TheFaction is not currently hostile, but will be if you launch this task force. Are you sure you wish to do this?

exerelin_invasion.nonHostileWarning: $TheFaction $isOrAre not currently hostile. An invasion is a major enough hostile action that it can't be concealed, regardless of transponder status.
exerelin_invasion.takeForSelfWarning:
You can take $market as a personal holding, but this will not please your current faction.

Proceed?
exerelin_invasion.takeForSelfNoWarning: As $market originally belonged to you (or is otherwise unclaimed), you may take it for yourself without penalty.
exerelin_invasion.repChangeCooldownMsg: No reputation gain as this market has already been captured recently
exerelin_invasion.invadeBlocked: Any orbital station and interfering fleets must be removed before an invasion is possible.
exerelin_invasion.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre invading $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction. The invasion forces are projected to be $strDesc and are likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
exerelin_invasion.intelDescRespawn: Remnants of the $theFaction have gathered to invade $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction, in a bid to revive their power. The invasion forces are projected to be $strDesc and are likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
exerelin_invasion.intelPredictionBombard: The invasion force is likely to resort to tactical bombardment.
exerelin_invasion.intelBrawl: $TheTargetFaction will likely deploy a large defense force to meet the invasion.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageAction: The invasion force is currently in-system.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageActionInsufficientReached: The invasion forces have failed to reach $location in adequate strength. The invasion is aborted.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageActionDefeatedGround: The invasion forces have been repelled by the ground defenses of $market.
exerelin_invasion.intelStageActionDefeatedSpace: The invasion force has been defeated by the defenders of $market.
exerelin_invasion.insufficientForces: You do not have the forces to carry out an effective invasion.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_win: Your forces overwhelm the enemy, seizing control of $market. Surviving defenders are surrendering.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_good: Your forces make excellent progress, pushing back the enemy rapidly.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_ok: Your forces slowly but surely gain ground against the enemy, driving them back.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_bad: Your forces encounter fierce resistance from the defenders of $market and make little headway.
exerelin_invasion.roundResult_lose: The defenders counterattack and eliminate your ground forces.
exerelin_invasion.noLosses: Your forces have not suffered any losses.
exerelin_invasion.endMsgLoot: The invasion forces captured a quantity of various items, as well as some credits.
exerelin_invasion.endMsgNoLoot: The invasion did not lead to the capture of a meaningful quantity of goods.

exerelin_markets.intelCapturePlayerDesc: $NewFaction $hasOrHave captured $market (size $size) in the $location from the $oldFaction, under the command of $player.
exerelin_markets.transferMarketWarning: Are you sure you wish to transfer $market to $theFaction?
exerelin_markets.transferMarketRep: Transferring $market will earn $repChange reputation with the recipient faction.
exerelin_markets.transferMarketOriginalOwner: $market was originally held by $theFaction, and will give $bonus the reputation if returned to them.
exerelin_markets.transferMarketRecentlyCaptured: $market was recently taken from $theFaction, and will only give $mult the reputation if returned now.
exerelin_markets.stabilizeHeader: Stabilizing $market will earn $reputation reputation with $theFaction, cost $credits and require the following commodities:
exerelin_markets.reinforcedDefensesHeader: You can reinforce the ground defenses of $market for $time days at a cost of $credits and the following commodities:
exerelin_markets.storageRebateTooltip: Storage fees for autonomous colonies and outposts are refunded.

exerelin_mining.miningToolsListHeader: The following mining ships and weapons exist in the Sector:
exerelin_mining.miningToolsListAddendum: Fighter wings and modules with the appropriate weapons count towards their parent ship's mining strength. Built-in weapons are also counted.
exerelin_mining.insufficientMachineryWarning: Your $shipOrFleet does not have enough heavy machinery to work at full capacity.

exerelin_ngc.ownFactionDisabledTooltip: No planet to spawn from in non-random sector, use free start instead
exerelin_ngc.freeStartTooltip: Own faction, but with no starting planet; you're on your own.
exerelin_ngc.customScenarioRemoved: Custom scenario $name is incompatible with non-random sector and has been disabled
exerelin_ngc.populatedSystemsTooltip: This is a target number of systems. Actual populated system count may be more or less than this.
exerelin_ngc.populatedPlanetsTooltip: Will fill new systems if specified number of populated systems is insufficient.
exerelin_ngc.stationsTooltip: Will fill new systems if specified number of populated systems is insufficient.
exerelin_ngc.maxMarketsTitle: Maximum inhabited planets + stations per system
exerelin_ngc.randomizeFactionsTooltip: Every faction has a 50% chance to be enabled (except independents, which will not be toggled from their current setting).

exerelin_officers.battle_noReportIn: Your $officers did not report in after the battle
exerelin_officers.battle_casualties: Your $officer was listed among the casualties
exerelin_officers.battle_casualties_plural: Your $officers were listed among the casualties
exerelin_officers.confirmDeath: The post-action report confirms that your $officers didn't make it
exerelin_officers.savedFromWreckage: Your $officer was saved from the wreckage
exerelin_officers.savedFromWreckagePlural: Your $officers were saved from the wreckage
exerelin_officers.noOfficersDeadForNow: No officers have died under your command... so far
exerelin_officers.noOfficersDead: No officers have died under your command.

nex_insurance.title: Insurance Payout
nex_insurance.desc: You have received $paid from $theEmployer to help cover your losses in the recent battle.
nex_insurance.descUnpaid: Due to your bad conduct in their eyes, $theEmployer have refused to make any insurance payments.
nex_insurance.descZeroHull: Base value assumes zero hull and combat readiness.
nex_insurance.entryDescLost: Ship lost; paying for base value
nex_insurance.entryDescRecovered: Ship recovered: had %s D-mods, now has %s
nex_insurance.entryDescNewDHull: New (D) hull: rated as total loss, paying for base value
nex_insurance.entryDescMoreDMods: D-mod count increased: paying %s of base value

nex_playerOutpost.resourceConsumeNote: All resources except crew will be consumed.
nex_playerOutpost.outpostComplete: Your new outpost has been completed.
nex_playerOutpost.insufficientResources: Your $shipOrFleet does not have enough resources to build an outpost.
nex_playerOutpost.tooltipUpkeep: Each outpost requires an upkeep of %s credits per month.
nex_playerOutpost.intelDesc: You have an outpost $name in the $location. It serves as a location for stockpiling of supplies and fuel, and a temporary storage location for salvage.
nex_playerOutpost.intelDescLost: The outpost is no longer operational.
nex_playerOutpost.intelPromptScuttle:
This will remotely shut down the station. All cargo will be lost.

Continue?

exerelin_raid.stageOrganizeRemnant: $TheAction is currently being planned at a base in the $location.
exerelin_raid.conditionListHeader: The following hostile factions have active raids in the system:

exerelin_reinitScreen.introText: You have loaded Nexerelin into an existing save. Please configure starting options:
exerelin_reinitScreen.allowRespawnNonOriginal: Allow respawn for factions not currently present

nex_reliefFleet.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre sending a relief fleet to $market in the $location, held by $theOtherFaction, to address recent unrest.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusAssembling: The aid convoy is being prepared and will launch from $market in $days.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusSuccess: The convoy has delivered the aid to $market.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusFailedToSpawn: The convoy has failed to assemble at $market.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusDefeated: The convoy has been destroyed or otherwise prevented from reaching its destination.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusTargetDestroyed: $market has been destroyed. Relief is now moot.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusHostile: $TheFaction $isOrAre hostile to $theOtherFaction. The relief convoy has been recalled.
nex_reliefFleet.intelStatusUnknown: The mission has been called off for unspecified reasons.

nex_respawn.baseIntelDesc: Remnants of $theFaction have established a base in the $location. They likely intend to use it as a staging point for their great re-entry into the Sector.
nex_respawn.baseIntelDescUnknown: You have not yet discovered the exact location or capabilities of this base.
nex_respawn.baseIntelDescAbandoned: This base is no longer operational.

nex_satbomb.intelDesc: $TheFaction $isOrAre launching a $action of $market in the $location, held by $theTargetFaction. The task force is projected to be $strDesc and is likely comprised of $numFleets $fleetsStr.
nex_satbomb.intelDescVengeance: The planned bombardment is an act of vengeance in response to the vile hostile actions of the hated $playerName.
nex_satbomb.intelStageAction: The task force is currently in-system.
nex_satbomb.intelStageActionInsufficientReached: The task force has failed to reach $location in adequate strength.
nex_satbomb.intelStageActionDefeatedGround: The task force has been repelled by the ground defenses of $market.
nex_satbomb.intelStageActionDefeatedSpace: The task force has been defeated by the defenders of $market.

exerelin_superweapon.successText: The missile scores a direct hit! $market has taken severe damage.

nex_tribute.intel_desc1: $TheFaction $hasOrHave sent you a comminique regarding the status of $market in the $system, which is claimed by said faction. The text is quite needlessly verbose, but can be readily summarized as "That's a nice colony you have there, $playerName. It would be a shame if something were to happen to it."
nex_tribute.intel_desc2: To avert an undesirable outcome, $theFaction demands a tribute equal to %s of the colony's gross income. Its population growth will also be reduced by %s, and it cannot exceed size %s.
nex_tribute.intel_descAccepted: You are currently paying tribute from $market.
nex_tribute.intel_descRejected: You have refused to pay tribute for $market.
nex_tribute.intel_descOver: The tribute event is now over.
nex_tribute.intel_descTime: You have $timeLeft $days to accept the offer.

nex_vengeance.intelDesc0: Due to your reputation with $theFaction, $aFleetType is being prepared, assigned to seek you out and eliminate you if possible.
nex_vengeance.intelDesc1: Due to your bitter hostilities with $theFaction, $aFleetType is being prepared, ordered to hunt your fleet down and destroy you.
nex_vengeance.intelDesc2: Due to your infamous and vengeful conflict with $theFaction, $aFleetType is being prepared, their directive being to find you and kill you by any means necessary.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusAssembling: The fleet will launch from $market in $days.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusActive: The fleet is currently active and will pursue you for $duration.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusFailedToSpawn: The fleet has failed to spawn. The event is now over.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusExpired: The fleet is returning to base.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusNoLongerHostile: $TheFaction $isOrAre no longer hostile. The vengeance mission has been terminated.
nex_vengeance.intelStatusUnknown: The mission has been called off for unspecified reasons.

exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_conquest: Congratulations! $TheFaction have crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the $clusterName cluster!
Congratulations! $TheFaction have crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_diplomatic: Congratulations! $TheFaction and their allies control the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_conquest_ally: Congratulations! Your ally $theFaction have crushed all opposition and now reigns supreme over the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.victory_diplomatic_ally: Congratulations! You have joined $theFaction and their other allies in controlling the Sector!
exerelin_victoryScreen.defeat_conquest: Alas, $theFaction have conquered the Sector. All your efforts have come to naught.
exerelin_victoryScreen.defeat_diplomatic: $TheFaction and their allies now dominate the Sector. Unfortunately, you are not one of them...
exerelin_victoryScreen.retired: You have chosen to retire prematurely. Yet the struggles of the Sector continue, on and on...
exerelin_victoryScreen.intelDescConquest: $TheFaction $hasOrHave crushed all possible competition. Their rule over the Sector is now undisputed.
exerelin_victoryScreen.intelDescDiplomatic: $TheFaction and their allies are the only remaining powers in the Sector. Peace has come to this corner of the galaxy, at least for now.
exerelin_victoryScreen.intelDescRetired: You, $playerName, have chosen to retire from the game. The conflicts of the Sector will have to unfold without you.

exerelin_misc.counterInsurgencyRep: At your current relationship with $theFaction, payment for deliveries is $mult of current per-unit price.
exerelin_misc.counterInsurgencyRepFixed: Payment for deliveries is $mult of current per-unit price.
exerelin_misc.aiCoresSelect: Select AI cores to turn in
exerelin_misc.aiCoresMsg1: Compared to dealing with other factions, turning AI cores in to $faction will result in:
exerelin_misc.aiCoresMsg2: If you turn in the selected AI cores, you will receive a %s bounty and your standing with $faction will improve by %s points.
exerelin_misc.blueprintSwapMsg: The selected blueprints are worth $points points.
exerelin_misc.pirateActivityPenaltyNone: No perceptible impact on operations as of yet.
exerelin_misc.pirateActivityPenaltyModified: Impacts reduced due to reputation with pirates (%s).
exerelin_misc.errorStarsectorVersion:
This version of Starsector is too old for %s!
Please make sure Starsector is up to date.
Required Version: %s
Current Version: %s
exerelin_misc.errorLazyLib:
Nexerelin requires LazyLib to function!
Get it at fractalsoftworks.com/forum/index.php?topic=5444.0
exerelin_misc.errorOfficerMaxLevel:
Officer max level in config is over 29 (current: $currMax)
This risks a hang during gameplay.
See http://fractalsoftworks.com/forum/index.php?topic=13195.0 for more details.
exerelin_misc.errorPrismLoad:
Failed to load Prism High-End Seller configuration defs!
Report this issue with your modlist.
